Dialogue: How is that possible?~Am I dreaming?
Tower, do you understand?~Go to the tower!
Full Clue: You are hurt, but no one can help you this far from the tower...

Dialogue: Head in the tower's direction.~You'll reach the village~...hopefully.
Full Clue: Someone in the village must be able to heal you with their magic

Dialogue: I've never been that close before, but if the stories are true...
Full Clue: I heard the tower has magic that can do anything...

Dialogue: Do you know the story about the man in the tower?~A bard told me about it a long time ago.~I can barely remember the detail...
